tool_description: Validates and cleans journal entry text content, checking for formatting issues, special characters, and length constraints.

raw_text.description: The raw journal entry text to be validated

max_length.description: Maximum allowed character length for the entry

allow_html.description: Whether to allow HTML tags in the text

error_messages: Text exceeds maximum length: Reduce text to stay within the specified character limit.
Invalid characters detected: Remove or replace unsupported special characters.
HTML tags found but not allowed: Remove HTML tags or set allow_html to true.
usage: Provide raw_text for validation. Optionally set max_length to control text size and allow_html to permit HTML formatting. Returns cleaned and validated text ready for further processing.

validated_text.description: The cleaned and validated journal entry text

character_count.description: Total character count of validated text

validation_status.description: Status indicating if validation passed or what was corrected
